article.headline: Drake 78, Southeast Missouri State 51
article.story: FAIRBANKS, Alaska (AP) -- Ajay Calvin scored 17 points and Drake defeated Southeast Missouri State 78-51 Friday in the opening round of the BP Top of the World Classic. The Bulldogs (1-0) bolted to a 10-0 lead and never trailed. Southeast Missouri (0-2) failed to score for the first four and a half minutes and fell behind 41-27 at the half. Drake shot 50 percent from the field and took its biggest lead, 78-48, with under a minute remaining. The Redhawks shot just 31 percent from the field, including 6-for-25 on 3-point attempts. Chris Bryant scored 15 points for Drake and Nick Grant added 11. The Bulldogs outrebounded the Redhawks 43-34 with Aliou Keita pulling down seven. Calvin added five. Michael Rembert led Southeast Missouri with nine points. Brandon Foust had eight rebounds. Drake faces Utah State on Saturday in the semifinals and Southeast Missouri faces Centenary in the consolation bracket.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
